description:
An open source, decentralized package manager, to automate building and sharing of packages


- Feature: Only warn on frozen conan v1 remote if enabled. (
- Feature: AutotoolsToolchain uses user's variables when Android cross-compilation at first. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: AutotoolsToolchain checks if Android cross-compilation paths exist. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Adding the Conan cache "profiles" folder to the jinja2 search path, so profiles can be included/imported from jinja syntax even for parent and sibling folders. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Updated tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to allow specifying the PowerShell executable (e.g., powershell.exe or pwsh) and passing additional arguments. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Feature: Deprecate use of tools.env.virtualenv:powershell=True/False. ( Docs: :page_with_curl:
- Fix: Do not show powershell deprecation message if value is None. (
- Fix: Fix LocalAPI definition of editables when calling editable_add. (
- Fix: Clarify debug message in CMakeDeps. (
- Fix: Added explicitly allow_empty = True to glob() function in BazelDeps (bazel 8.x compatible). (
- Fix: Fix broken cpp_info.location deduction due to unsanitized regex. (
- Fix: Trusting the real path coming from a symlink is a good one. (
- Fix: Fix user/channel when searching patterns in a local-recipes-index. (
- Fix: Add warning for empty version ranges. (
- Bugfix: Fix bogus duplication of component properties (
- Bugfix: Fix running commands in powershell with single quotes. (
- Bugfix: Fix issues with unsetting some types of confs. (
